outline:
1. to seek out, swell, cause to swell, boil up, enquire
    1. (Qal)
      1. to seek, enquire
      2. to cause to boil up
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be searched out
      2. to be swelling, bulging, swelling out
kjv_def: cause, inquire, seek up, swell out.
strongs_def: to gush over, i.e. to swell; (figuratively) to desire earnestly; by implication to ask
